original_text: Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, had no sons, but only daughters. The names of Zelophehad's daughters were Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah and Tirzah.
korean_text: 헤벨의 아들 슬로브핫은 아들이 없고 딸뿐이라 그 딸의 이름은 말라와 노아와 호글라와 밀가와 디르사니

sentences.original_text: Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, had no sons
were Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah and Tirzah
sentences.korean_translation: 말라, 노아, 호글라, 밀가 및 디르사였습니다
